summary: Data Engineer with extensive experience in data warehouse development, data quality control, and risk analysis in the financial sector.

work_history.description: Development of a data warehouse for analytics and management reporting purposes; Development, implementation and support of automated data storefronts in the data warehouse for the purposes of analytics and management reporting; Data quality control in the data warehouse; Ensuring data integration into the data warehouse; Interaction with other structural divisions of the Company on the development of the data warehouse; Advising users and customers of management reporting and analytics on data warehouse issues; Processing of ad-hoc requests within the framework of the Management functionality; Identifying operational risks in the Company's activities.

Management of Online Events; Development and Administration of Online Processes: Develop and implement processes for sending push notifications aimed at product evaluation, as well as marketing communications; Push Notification Strategy: Establish and manage strategies for effective push notifications to enhance user engagement and gather valuable feedback on products.

Implementation, development and improvement of an automatic decision-making system; Automation and optimization of the lending process; Adding new products to the system within the product group of loans; Monitoring the functioning of the lending strategy within the product group of loans; Development of new lending strategies within the product group of loans; Monitoring the system of interaction of various IT applications involved in the loan application review process.

Administration, Development, and Enhancement of Automated Decision-Making Systems; Automation and Optimization of the Lending Process; Integration of New Products and Scenarios; Monitoring of Credit Strategy Performance; Development of New Lending Strategies; Oversight of IT Application Integration.
Preparation of children for specialized schools; Data entry and processing of results.
Responsibilities included searching for tenders, creating websites on the Tilda platform, and promoting them (Google AdWords, Yandex Direct). Achievements: 3 working websites (on the Tilda platform).

Implementation, development and improvement of an automatic decision-making system; Automation and optimization of the lending process; Adding new products to the system within the product group of loans; Monitoring the functioning of the lending strategy within the product group of loans; Development of new lending strategies within the product group of loans; Monitoring the system of interaction of various IT applications involved in the loan application review process.

education.degree: Магистр, Информационные технологии, Математическое и компьютерное моделирование
